personalMessage: Happy Birthday to the most amazing person in my life! From the moment we met, you've filled my days with joy, laughter, and endless love. Today we celebrate not just another year of your beautiful life, but all the incredible memories we've created together and all the adventures still to come.
finalMessage: As you turn another page in the story of your life, I want you to know that being part of your journey has been the greatest gift I could ever ask for. Your love has transformed me in ways I never thought possible, and I promise to spend every day showing you just how much you mean to me. Here's to celebrating you today and loving you always. Happy Birthday, my darling. Forever yours.
